attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. News sounded weird, made me think of fake news. Just a waste of space and do not recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Honestly what is the whole point of this app like Apple needs to get rid of it and make more room for other things; like dinosaurs games and cooking games.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: Honestly i wish i could rate this app ZERO stars based on how TERRIBLE it is! It is so slow and makes my phone run slower in general and it is very glitchy! And also to mention it killed my grandma!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: This app is terrible, so many glitches, so many racists, so many bugs. It actually ruined my fish’s life. I am disappointed in the App Store for continuing to have this app available.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER!!!

attributes.review: I opened the app and it asked for my number it was trying to track my information just like he said they didn’t want to do 👁👄👁
attributes.title: Very bad app🧚

attributes.review: So one day I hang up and took all my money and my long horn the my washer was gone everting was gone then took my flying car to Walmart and the was gone out of everything
attributes.title: The worst app

attributes.review: this app literally stole my dog. i downloaded it right before i went to go take my dog for a walk. and i looked down and my dog was gone. i looked all over the house and all throughout the neighborhood and called him for hours. and nothing. it’s been a months and he’s still missing. if you find my dog his name is “trumps common sense” please return him to the whites house. thank you!!!
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: This app belongs in the garbage. First of who da hell likes trump and secondly I open the app and I find of horrifying picture of an angry cremesicle. This deserves to be removed from the App Store, I don’t want it to scar anyone eyes like it did for me. :(
attributes.title: What a hideous app

attributes.review: Not only did it ask for my ✨age✨but it asked for my phone number—an INVASION of privacy🐲I feel disrespected and abused😔this app is useless and a waste of your time and it should be SUED🤢btw no one wants to vote for u❤️
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: I definitely ordered crunchy, hot Cheetos, but I was lied to and given nasty puffy Cheeto 🤢 I threw up on my phone and now I’m having to write this on my refrigerator 🤬 definitely do not recommend
attributes.title: I’m not mad, just disappointed
